properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1 v7 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Prabhu Yesu naa rakshakaa nosagu kannulu naaku nirathamu ne ninnu jooda alphayu neeve omegayu neeve{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Priyudaina Yohaanu pathmaasulo priyamaina yesoo nee swaroopamu priyamaara joochi bahu dhanyudayye priya prabhu ninnu jooda nimmu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lekkaleni maarlu padipotini dikkuleni vaada ne naitini chakkajesi naa netraalu derachi grakkuna ninnu jooda nimmu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Erigi yerigi ne chedipotini Yesu nee gaayamu repitini mosa poti nenu drusti dolagiti daasuda nannu jooda nimmu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Endaresuni vaipu choochedaro pondedaru velgu mukhamuna sandiyambu leka santoshinchuchu munduku parugethedaru{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Vishwaasa karthaa O Yesu prabhoo konasaaginchu vaadaa Yesu prabhoo vinayamutho nenu nee vaipu joochuchu visugaka parugetha nerpu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Kantiki kanabadani venniyo cheviki vinabadani venniyo hrudaya gocharamu kaani venniyo siddha parachitivaa naakai ?{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Loka bhogaalapai naa netraalu Sokakundunatlu krupa joopumu nee mahima divya swaroopa Munu nindaara nannu joodanimmu{/lang-eng}
